definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Sa 4:12 measure, also cloth garment (as extended, wide);—sf. [[מַדּוֹ]] Ps 109:18; [[מִדּוֹ]] Le 6:3, 2Sa 20:8 ([[מִדָּהּ]] Job 11:9, v. sub [[מִדָּה]]); pl. [[מִדִּין]] Ju Jdg 5:10 (v. infr.), 2Sa 21:20 Kt (Qr [[מָדוֹן]]; rd. perh. [[מִדָּה]], v. 1Ch 20:6, cf. Dr); sf. [[מִדַּיִח]] Je 13:25; [[מַדָּיו]] 1Sa 4:12 + 4 t.;—
measure (only pl.) = apportionment Je 13:25, [[מְנָֽת־מִדַּיִךְ]] (of lot of Judah, ‖[[גּוֹרָל]]); cf. lit. 2Sa 21:20 Kt (but v. [[מִדָּה]]).
perh. cloth, carpet (for sitting on), Ju Jdg 5:10 (so most, conj. fr. context; on pl. in [[ן]], v. Ges:§ 87, l. a).

garment, outer garment Ju Jdg 3:16, 1Sa 4:12, cf. (sim.) Ps 109:18; of fighting-attire 1Sa 17:38 (c. vb. [[הִלְבִּשׁ]]), v:1Sa 17:39, 1Sa 18:4, 2Sa 20:8 (‖[[לְבוּשׁ]]); of priest's garment [[וְלָבַשׁ הַכּׂהֵן מִדּוֹ בַד]] Le 6:3; cf. [[[מָדוּ]], [[מַדְוֶה]]] sub [[מדה]].
